t:
“Is that a knife in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me?” She asked, noticing the bulge in his pants.



          Turns out, it was both.
c:
The police had no clue about the numerous rape and murders done in the same style across the country.

Hint: He was happy to see her, his new victim.



#happy #pants #love #see #unaware #danger #serialkiller #death
